data.name: GG Land
data.detailed_description:
GG Land is a place where all kinds of games meet together. And it also has a built-in game building tool! With this tool, you can create your own game in minutes without knowing anything about code or design!

Are you interested in creating content?
Then you might be interested in our powerful, easy to use game building tool.
Using it, you will have the power to create your own unique game with multiplayer support in minutes!

Are you into playing indie games?
In this case, you might want to try out the games already created by our amazing community.


Some of the game features include:
  • Multiplayer support for all published games!
  • VR and Non-VR support!
  • Game saves for offline gameplay.
  • Easy to use game builder.
  • No-code gameplay creation tool.

data.short_description: GG Land is a place where all kinds of games meet together. And it also has a built-in game building tool! With this tool, you can create your own game in minutes without knowing anything about code or design!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are minimum requirements for VR, lower specs may work for non-VR.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 9600 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
